name: BioCell Collagen® HD
description: BioCell Collagen® HD is a high-density clinically studied dietary ingredient composed of naturally occurring hydrolyzed collagen type II peptides, chondroitin sulfate, and hyaluronic acid. It is recommended to be used in dietary supplements, including soft gels, tablets, and capsules. BioCell Collagen® HD uses a unique matrix that is not a blend of individual ingredients. Numerous safety, efficacy, and bioavailability research studies, including seven human clinical trials, confirm that BioCell Collagen® promotes active joints, youthful-looking skin, and healthy connective tissues. BioCell Collagen® is made exclusively in the USA and Germany.
